attributes.action: Recognize Jediism as a religion by incorporating it into the National Curriculum and including it on the Racial and Religious Hatred Act.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The 2001 Census revealed 390,000 people in Britain were of the Jedi Faith. This makes it the fourth largest religion in Britain. In 2005, it was deliberately not included in the Racial and Religious Hatred Bill. We, the undersigned, ask the Prime Minister to include Jediism in this act, as well as teach it in schools throughout Britain in Religious Studies classes.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
